attributes.action: Make lie detection admissible to be considered alongside eyewitness accounts
attributes.additional_details:
By considering lie detection results alongside eyewitness accounts, we can increase the reliability of evidence. Crimes may be resolved sooner and with more accuracy. 

Source: http://www.bbc.co.uk/blogs/theoneshow/consumer/2009/01/16/should-lie-detectors-be-used-a.html
attributes.background:
Polygraphs and other methods of lie detection (such as analysing body language and facial expressions) should be considered when reviewing eyewitness accounts in court.

Polygraphs are 80-90% accurate whereas eyewitness accounts are only 65-70% accurate.
